div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1104 Kerch'? (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1852 or earlier Burial: 3rd cent. B.C.? Contents: AE Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 28-33?) Disposition: Leningrad (part, merged with main collection) Sibirskii, ZOOID 10 (1877), p. 39
